text: Ester Schreiber (born 1997) is a Swedish foil fencer, who won the bronze medal in the 2013–14 Fencing World Cup. In 2014 and 2015, Schreiber was a Swedish Senior Fencing National Champion.Barnard College website. "Meet Barnard's Student Athletes: Ester Schreiber '20, Women's Fencing", 28 March 2018. Retrieved 18 July 2019. Schreiber is enrolled at Barnard College (2020) and fences on the Columbia Lions fencing team of Columbia University.Columbia University Athletics website. "2018-19 Fencing Roster". Retrieved 17 July 2019. In the 2019 season, Schreiber helped her team achieve an undefeated record and win the woman's Ivy League Fencing Championships. ==Early life and education== Schreiber is from Gothenburg, Sweden. She attended high school at the Sigrid Rudebecks Gymnasium. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Barnard College alumni Category:Columbia Lions fencers Category:People from Gothenburg Category:Swedish foil fencers Category:Swedish female fencers
title: Ester Schreiber
